data.text: @PaleRider01 He had an 87 grade with PFF this year which was best on their line and the best graded OL as a rookie in 2020. Michael Onwenu is a very good player.
@MONTECRI5TO So he was benched a bunch of times and we should bring him in? That's the most "GIANTS" thing I have heard in a while.
@Commish43 I think it’s harder to get tricked on if their OL is actually good now that Dante Scarnecchia and Tom Brady are gone.
@MONTECRI5TO No more NE lineman. If they were any good, BB wouldn’t let them leave.
@MONTECRI5TO Dude is a beast and would be an awesome addition on the interior
@MONTECRI5TO This is the second time in as many days that I've seen his name thrown around. Would be interesting addition.
